metadata.name: SLIC Viewer
metadata.desc: An image viewer application demonstrating the Image Compression format I've created.

info.content: SLIC Viewer is a Java Swing application implementing the experimental Image Compression/Decompression Algorithm: Squares and Lines Image Compression (SLIC)
It can take bitmap images and compress them into SLIC file using the CODEC I implemented. The format is experimental.

info.title: Features
items: Compress BITMAP images into SLIC images
Decompress SLIC images into BITMAP images
